info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:27AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Burke, southeastern Richmond, Barnwell, Bamberg, south central Aiken and southwestern Orangeburg Counties through 300 AM EDT... At 226 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Denmark to 7 miles northeast of Savannah River Site to near Hephzibah. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Barnwell, Bamberg, Denmark, Savannah River Site, Plant Vogtle, Hephzibah, Williston, Blackville, Jackson, Branchville, Sardis, Alexander, Burke County Airport, McBean, Barnwell State Park, Rivers Bridge State Park, Ehrhardt, Hilda and Norway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
